mapper.select: SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP, qrtz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION, qrtz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM CHEVHUZHU_JOB_DETAILS qrtz_job_details JOIN CHEVHUZHU_TRIGGERS qrtz_triggers JOIN CHEVHUZHU_CRON_TRIGGERS qrtz_cron_triggers ON qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME = qrtz_triggers.JOB_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP
